Export.CSP:
'use strict';
angular.module('recruting',['ngCookies']). config(['$routeProvider',function($routeProvider) { $routeProvider.
when('/admin/vacancyresp/:vacID',{templateUrl: 'partials/response.html', controller:vrShow}). when('/admin',{templateUrl: 'partials/vacancies.html', controller:vacancyCtrl}).
when('/admin/users',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_users.html', controller:SystemUserShow}). when('/admin/adduser',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_adduser.html', controller:SystemUserShow}). when('/admin/user/:UID',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_user.html', controller:SystemUserShow}).
when('/admin/companies',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_companies.html', controller:CompanyShow}). when('/admin/addcompany',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_addcompany.html', controller:CompanyShow}). when('/admin/company/:compID',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_company.html', controller:CompanyShow}).
when('/admin/vacancy/:vacID',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_vacancy.html', controller:adminVacanciesCtrl}). when('/admin/addvacancy/',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_addvacancy.html', controller:adminVacanciesCtrl}).
when('/vacancies',{templateUrl: 'partials/vacancies.html', controller:vacancyCtrl}). when('/vacancy/:vacID', {templateUrl: 'partials/vacancy.html', controller:vacancyShowCtrl}). when('/company/:compID',{templateUrl: 'partials/company.html', controller:companyCtrl}). otherwise({redirectTo: '/vacancies'}); }]);
